summary: This is an email from a paralegal specialist at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York to defense attorney Jason Foy regarding the government's sixth discovery production in the case U.S. v. Noel (No. 19 Cr 830). It includes attachments with the production letter and materials.

persons.name: Jason Foy
persons.context: Recipient of the email regarding discovery production in the case U.S. v. Noel; appears to be defense counsel.

persons.name: Noel
persons.context: The defendant in the criminal case U.S. v. Noel (No. 19 Cr 830), which is the subject of the discovery production.

connections.description: Jason Foy is receiving discovery materials as defense counsel for the defendant Noel in the criminal case.

events.title: Discovery Production 6
events.description: The U.S. Attorney's Office produces the sixth set of discovery materials to defense counsel in the case U.S. v. Noel.

keyFacts: The document is an email regarding discovery production in the criminal case U.S. v. Noel (No. 19 Cr 830).
The production is the sixth discovery set provided by the government to the defense.
The email is sent from a paralegal specialist at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The attachments include a letter and discovery materials uploaded to USAfx.
